changelogversion.changelogtext: [b]Quick Fix![/b] Changed code for older Android version
[b]Added![/b] Possibility to chose source player if page have multiple
[b]Added![/b] Download confirm dialog showing file size
[b]Fixed![/b] A bug causing restoration to apply an empty string for Search n' Go
[b]Unresolvable Bug![/b] The Watch Later list will remove all Search n' Go element if you upgrade version
[b]Search n' Go PREVIEW 5 + Watch Later List[/b]
[b]Fixed![/b] Manga Reader, if activity killed, now restore actual page
[b]Fixed![/b] Search n' Go Provider Settings validate and cancel button was not translated
[b]Fixed![/b] Update value was not updating when refresh
[b]Fixed![/b] Serialized-Elements were not linked to the original
[b]Fixed![/b] (Maybe) Bug were the snackbar was displaying "downloading..." indefinetly if you network were too quick
[b]Fixed![/b] (Maybe) Bug were the application was crashing due to a bad Dynamic-NavigationView restoration
[b]Added![/b] Support for weak and older smartphone
[b]Changed![/b] Serialization added for everything in BoxPlay
[b]Fixed![/b] BoxPlay Core is now more stable
[b]Fixed![/b] Bug causing item to be forgot and application was crashing
[b]Fixed![/b] Managers was using wrong context, they now use the application main context
[b]Fixed![/b] Video Activity was crashing due to forgot configuration section
[b]Fixed![/b] Lot of managers was using a wrong UI context, and were causing NullPointerException because of this
[b]Fixed![/b] WorkingProgressDialog is now a full usable dialog (used in Premium and now in Search n' Go)
[b]Fixed![/b] Almost full BoxPlay Activity restoration if she was killed
[b]Fixed![/b] ... a lot of little one fixed too ...
[b]Fixed![/b] Extractor was not checking if the streaming was possible before processing the page
[b]Fixed![/b] Bugs in the library page causing the Tabs not fully scrolling
[b]New![/b] App relunch itself when changing language
[b]Fixed![/b] Some bug that was causing unexpected crash when restoring the app
[b]New![/b] Button for any music (play after current and add to queue)
[b]Info![/b] Reduced card size, for more intuitive navigation
[b]New![/b] Video will be checking on what server there are on
[b]Fixed![/b] A lot of typo (but a lot are still remaining)
[b]Started![/b] Working on a new API with Fabien
[b]New![/b] Music tab for the BoxPlay Store
[b]New![/b] Research feature; more optimized now, and also linked between Store
[b]Added![/b] Possibility remove the feature that lock the back button (settings)
[b]Changed![/b] And Polished a lot of the card design
[b]Fixed![/b] A bug that were unselecting menu if it was already clicked
[b](Possibly) Fixed![/b] A bug that caused image to be square, ramdomly append, don\'t know why...
[b]Welcome![/b] Dorian HARDY to our team! As a quick-hosting provider
[b]Added![/b] New settings for background tasks, language and crash-reporting
[b]Added![/b] Per-Video overriding data (video url and language)
[b]Optimizing![/b] Video Factory, will change soon to a File Factory (seems like a hint to soon update ;))
[b]Fixed![/b] Bug that was crashing the app if you have no connection
[b]Fixed![/b] A bug, that if VLC was returning an error, the application was crashing
[b]Fixed![/b] BoxPlay Activity was restarting if you were canceling Video Activity with aciton bar button
[b]I re-done everything...[/b] so any of previous changelog is wrong.
[b]Added![/b] Now see the update name when the update ask you if you want to download the new version

[b]Info[/b] Application architecture will change a lot to be compatible cross-plateform (PC, Phone, Web, ...), crash might occurs. If the application crashed for you, please tell me, BoxPlay automatically create a dump of the stacktrace before dieing (that help me to fix them!)
[b]VLC GOT SOME BUGS, SO YOU NEED TO CLICK MULTIPLES TIME ON THE SAME ITEM IF THAT NOT WORKING AT FIRST TRY[/b]
[b]ONLY USABLE WHEN CDN IS ONLINE, CDN=MY COMPUTER[/b]
Demo available on my Youtube channel if you want to see how it work!
[b]Added![/b] CDNs, Content Delivery Network, direct access of my hard drives for more animes, but will not be as beautiful as the main menu, that for fast delivery only!
[b]Added![/b] You can now reset the fast and local cache
[b]Added![/b] Color for video in video lists, for easiest reading
[b]New![/b] Color for the video group "Serie", is now easier to read
[b]Fixed![/b] OAV, SPECIAL and MOVIES for Anime finally work!
[b]Fixed![/b] App was crashing if the server was unreachable
Some other changes I can't quite remember
[b]Fixed![/b] VLC error if video failed fetching
[b]Fixed![/b] VLC not starting at saved time
[b]Fixed![/b] Infinite login loop in the code, API overloaded
